title: @Riot , I'm sorry, but this question has been bugging me lately, and there's no clear answer to it.
body:
I mean I've got to ask this. **What colour was Swain's hair (when he was younger) ?** Currently, he's getting old, and he will keep on getting older, which means more gray(/white) hair.
And I mean, I'm really overthinking this, and I cannot figure it out. Why?
1. He's got that Lucious Malfoy look, _and you **can't** deny it                 _                                                          **/ +blondie**
2. In both his **old** splasharts and models he has dark (black/dark brown) hair                                      **     /  +dark**
3. In his splashart he looks like he has blonde hair (plus some gray hair but y'know he's getting old and he's currently in like mid-40s or something like that I believe) which is also the case (kinda) when it comes to his skins (**EXCEPT FOR THE BILGEWATER ONE (5) **)   ** /  +blondie**
4. In the Nexus post (link posted above) his "young" version ~~(hey girl)~~ he "has" dark hair                     **  /   +dark**
See how the "points" end up being even?** 2 for dark hair and 2 for blonde hair.** This is why I need for Riot to decide whether Swain is on the dark side, or is a blondie.
     _            **  ~~Sorry, not sorry.~~**_

replies.body:
Yes, I always assumed he had dark hair.

It's not yet clear if his white hair is because he's getting on in years... or because DEMON. Maybe we'll explore more of his backstory soon.

All I want is to know the details of the relationship between Swain and the Demon. The nitty gritty specifics of how Swain's body has adapted to it, the limitations of its power, the precise nature of said power... 

Riot'd make my year if we got that.

~~More Vlad content doesnt hurt either~~
Shhh stop posting with your other account Blood Magicks! /kappa

Reav3 mentioned in the same (reddit) post it was likely age, but his hair turning white overnight due to his struggle with the demon is pretty badass.

> soon 

I daydream about my boards name becoming some shade of red (preferably crimson), so that I can post cryptic "fairly soon" messages wherever it would maximize hype and/or distress. Wielding the power to disrupt so many peaceful lives must be intoxicating.

PS **Tides of Blood** (Matt) is my friend and not an alt account.

I also always wondered why he had red eyes, considering it's not a natural eye color, at least not for humans. Then again, I looked at the ravens - red eyes (also black feathers so like it's kinda like with his black hair). Though, with his white hair I thought about the so called "white raven/crow" (which is sort of a saying in my country, not sure about other countries) which basically means something unusual, uncanny, which is something I suppose you could say about Swain.
Though, anyway thank you for the confirmation.
Also, Is Swain's demon-hand connected to his nevous system? It's for--- uh... confirming how a **certain job**  is called when it comes to him.. and it's rather... _**inappropriate**_
Maybe it's what spending too much time in Morde's Immortal Bastion does to you :P
